title: torch.potrf fails on a positive semidefinite matrix
body_html:
Hello, I know about issue #199 but can't understand how to check the versions of BLAS, LAPACK etc.
The code I run is

import torch
sigma = torch.FloatTensor([[1, 20], [1, 100]])
torch.portf(sigma)

After that I get RuntimeError: Lapack Error in potrf : the leading minor of order 2 is not positive definite at /pytorch/torch/lib/TH/generic/THTensorLapack.c:617

This issue was reproduced for Pytorch 0.3.1 and 0.4.0.
Numpy solves this task successfully.

body:
Hello, I know about issue #199 but can't understand how to check the versions of BLAS, LAPACK etc.
The code I run is 
```{python}
import torch
sigma = torch.FloatTensor([[1, 20], [1, 100]])
torch.portf(sigma)
```

After that I get `RuntimeError: Lapack Error in potrf : the leading minor of order 2 is not positive definite at /pytorch/torch/lib/TH/generic/THTensorLapack.c:617`

This issue was reproduced for Pytorch 0.3.1 and 0.4.0.
Numpy solves this task successfully.
